protocols

Class P2protocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • protocols.P2protocol

  • public class P2protocol
extends java.lang.Object
    An application-level protocol for communication between user and data basis servers.
    Author:
    retax

      • P2protocol

        public P2protocol(Config config,
          P2protocol.Site site,
          BDServer bd)
        P1protocol constructor; we fill in addresses of servers from config object
        Parameters:
        config - - list of database servers addresses
        site - - which DB we are
        bd - - an instance of DBServer we are in

    • Method Detail

      • talk

        public java.lang.Object talk(java.net.Socket socket,
                    P2protocol.Request request,
                    java.lang.String query)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        The most important method. Here is implemented whole communication.
        Parameters:
        socket - - for connection between Data Base and user
        request - - for connection between Data Base and user
        query - - argument of UPDATE request
        con - - for connection between Data Bases
        Returns:
        null if we are in DBServer or if error occurs. Otherwise Boolean while pinging and ResultSet while asking DB about some info.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
